body.body: Before starting work, ensure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported. This will help prevent it from falling and causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.

To prevent damage to the seat or cover, care must be taken not to drop the seat. Do not lean the seat against the motorcycle or any surface which may damage the seat or cover. Instead, place the seat, with the seat cover facing downwards, on a clean, flat surface which is covered with a soft cloth.
Do not place any item on the seat which may cause damage or staining to the seat cover.
The seat lock is situated on the left hand side of the motorcycle, in the frame, below the seat.
Insert the ignition key into the seat lock and turn the key anti-clockwise while pressing down on the rear part of the passenger seat.
To detach the passenger seat, lift the front and slide the seat forwards to disengage with the location in the rear subframe.

title: Passenger Seat - Removal
